com.ikalagaming.core.packages

Class Plugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.core.packages.Plugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlugin, Package

    public class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlugin
    A package that is loaded from an external source.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean disable()
      Deactivates the package and halts all of its operations.
      boolean enable()
      Activates the package and enables it to perform its normal functions.

      Returns the FileConfiguration for the plugin.

      Returns a PluginDescription for the plugin.

      Returns the type of package this is.

      Returns the current package manager reference, if it exists.

      Returns this classes version number.

      Returns true if the package is enabled, and false otherwise.

      This method is called when the package is disabled.
      void onEnable()
      This method is called when the package is enabled.
      void onLoad()
      Called when the package is loaded into memory.
      void onUnload()
      Called when the package is unloaded from memory.
      boolean reload()
      Disables and then enables the package.
      void reloadConfig()
      Clears out the configuration in memory and reloads it from the disk.
      void saveConfig()
      Saves the configuration to disk.
      void saveDefaultConfig()
      Saves the default configuration.

      Stores a reference to the PackageManager that is handling this package.

    • Method Detail

      • disable

        public boolean disable()
        Description copied from interface: Package
        Deactivates the package and halts all of its operations. The package is still loaded in memory but not active. Calls Package.onDisable().
        Specified by:
        disable in interface Package
        Returns:
        true if the package has been successfully disabled

      • enable

        public boolean enable()
        Description copied from interface: Package
        Activates the package and enables it to perform its normal functions. Calls Package.onEnable().
        Specified by:
        enable in interface Package
        Returns:
        true if the package was successfully enabled

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Package

        public double getVersion()
        Description copied from interface: Package

      • saveConfig

        public void saveConfig()
        Description copied from interface: IPlugin
        Saves the configuration to disk. Any changes made in memory will overwrite the file on disk.
        Specified by:
        saveConfig in interface IPlugin

      • saveDefaultConfig

        public void saveDefaultConfig()
        Description copied from interface: IPlugin
        Saves the default configuration. If a configuration already exists on disk, nothing happens. If no default configuration file is in contained in the plugin, an empty configuration file is saved.
        Specified by:
        saveDefaultConfig in interface IPlugin

      • reloadConfig

        public void reloadConfig()
        Description copied from interface: IPlugin
        Clears out the configuration in memory and reloads it from the disk.
        Specified by:
        reloadConfig in interface IPlugin
